text: al-Qaeda in Iraq or Tanzim Qaidat al-Jihad fi Bilad al-Rafidayn () was a Salafi jihadist militant group affiliated with al-Qaeda. It was created on the 17 October 2004 and was led by Abu Musab al-Zarqawi and Abu Ayyub al-Masri until it became the Islamic State of Iraq on the 15 October 2006. == References== Category:Islamist militant groups
title: Al-Qaeda in Iraq
